name: sniper type Barrett M82 .50 caliber
description:
This is a model of lora who add a Barrett M82 model on you character.
dont need to modifie the force on the lora or if you want play around 0.8 to 1.2

all my image are 1 shot promp, to prove how stable it is

modelVersions.name: v2
modelVersions.description:
we change the trigger word, now it is 50Caliber

the lora is realy more stabe and accurate.
all my image are 1 shot promp, to prove how stable it is
